autoOpen.description: By default, all multi-level menus are expanded
autoOpen.description_zh: 默认展开所有多级菜单

autoScrollIntoView.description: Whether to automatically scroll the selected items to the visible area
autoScrollIntoView.description_zh: 是否自动滚动选中项目到可见区域

collapse.description: Whether to collapse the menu horizontally
collapse.description_zh: 是否水平折叠收起菜单

hasCollapseButton.description: Whether or not there is a built-in folding button

selectable.description: Whether the menu option is optional

:levelIndent.description: The amount of indentation between levels

mode.description: Menu types, currently vertical, horizontal, pop-up
mode.description_zh: 菜单类型，目前支持垂直（vertical）、水平菜单（horizontal）、弹出（pop）

:defaultOpenKeys.description_zh: 初始展开的子菜单 key 数组

:defaultSelectedKeys.description: Initially selected menu item key array
:defaultSelectedKeys.description_zh: 初始选中的菜单项 key 数组

ellipsis.description: Whether the horizontal menu is automatically overflowed and omitted
ellipsis.description_zh: 水平菜单是否自动溢出省略

:icons.type: {horizontalArrowDown?: ReactNode | null;popArrowRight?: ReactNode | null;collapseDefault?: ReactNode | null;collapseActive?: ReactNode | null;}

:openKeys.description_zh: 展开的子菜单 key 数组（受控模式）

:scrollConfig.description: Scroll to the config item in the visible area to receive all scroll-into-view-if-needed parameters
:scrollConfig.description_zh: 滚动到可见区域的配置项，接收所有scroll-into-view-if-needed的参数

:selectedKeys.description: Selected menu item key array (controlled mode)
:selectedKeys.description_zh: 选中的菜单项 key 数组（受控模式）

:tooltipProps.description: All ToolTip props are accepted in pop-up mode
:tooltipProps.description_zh: 弹出模式下可接受所有 ToolTip 的 Props

:triggerProps.description: Props that accept all triggers are accepted in pop-up mode
:triggerProps.description_zh: 弹出模式下可接受所有 Trigger 的 Props

events.name: onClickMenuItem
events.description: Click the callback for the menu item

events.name: onClickSubMenu
events.description: Click on the callback for the submenu header
events.description_zh: 点击子菜单标题的回调
events.params: (key: string, openKeys: string[], keyPath: string[]) => void

events.name: onCollapseChange
events.description: Callback when the collapse status changes
events.description_zh: 折叠状态改变时的回调
